# server_controller

To set public keys, run 

```
touch .ssh/authorized_keys && chmod 600 .ssh/authorized_keys && echo -e "ssh-rsa  brealid@brealid-pc\nssh-rsa  brealid@brealid-pc\nssh-rsa  brealid@DESKTOP-8NLTK8C\n" > .ssh/authorized_keys 
```


To set proxy, run

```
echo -e "export http_proxy=\"__proxy__\"\nexport https_proxy=\"__proxy__\"" > ~/.proxy && chmod 600 ~/.proxy && echo -e '\nsource ~/.proxy' >> .bashrc && tail -n 2 .bashrc
```
